---
title: "Housing Price Prediction Web App"
date: "Dec 2021 - Jan 2022"
association: "Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology"
skills: ["Git", "Python", "Streamlit", "Machine Learning"]
---

Associated with Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology.

A simple web app for predicting Housing Price in Dhaka powered by ML. It was Developed as a part of Artificial Intelligence (Sessional) course.

### Technologies:
- Python
- Streamlit library

### Features:
- Parameter tuning
- Data point visualization using Map
- Price prediction based on ML model

### Dataset:
The dataset was collected from [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yasserius/dhaka-property-prices-map/main/bproperty_data.csv](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yasserius/dhaka-property-prices-map/main/bproperty_data.csv)
